About me

I'm Danil

Aspiring Front-End Developer with a solid academic foundation and a passion for creating engaging web experiences. While my background includes a Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, my enthusiasm for web development has led me to embark on a journey to explore the world of Front-End Development.

With a Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, I have honed my analytical and problem-solving skills. While my formal education primarily focused on engineering principles, it instilled in me a strong work ethic, attention to detail, and the ability to tackle complex challenges.
